entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 3. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light before morning. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 8.
